Text: San Diego Trib Opinion Section This SD Union Tribune opinion piece by Rosenfield is amazing Looks like the media is willing to let allegations of all sorts be stated as fact by the unbiased likes of Mr Rosenfield Can mass hysteria be far away

WPTF and GovtReg Affairs personnel inquiryYour schedule must be loony so rather than occupy your time on the phone Ill send two questions via email Are you attending the WPTF general mtg this wk in Phoenix If so Ill see you there If not let me know if can help you out there Who would you suggest I talk to regarding Govt Affairs staffing opportunities in the West that is if such opps exist Regards Gary
